title.narrative: Establishing Inclusive, Just, and Sustainable Peace in Cueibet County, Lakes State, South Sudan

description.narrative: The AVSI Foundation is working to increase protection for women, with a strong emphasis on GBV, and the promotion of female leadership and participation in peacebuilding at all levels of the country, especially local peace institutions at the lowest administrative levels. Program activities include a conflict mapping exercise incorporating gender and social network analysis; GBV sensitization and training for community-based men and women, teachers, and school matrons, as well as local authorities who are not directly involved in law enforcement; and implementation of basic literacy and numeracy outreach programs.
